title: Viral Video of Woman Beating Child Is From Malaysia, Not India
subtitle: Woman Beating Child Viral Video Fact Check: A video circulating on social media claims that it is from India. The video shows a woman beating a child and handling the child in an inhuman way. However, the video is not from India but Malaysia.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video circulating on social media claims that it is from India. The video shows a woman beating a child and handling the child in an inhuman way. The claim along the video reads:

Several social media users have shared the video on Twitter with the same claim.
